channel.title: Needing Help With Client

item.title: Needing Help With Client
item.dc:creator: @Elux Elux
item.description:
@Elux wrote:

Hey, im trying to fix up my webclient and i cannot get it working. I get to requesting title screen then it comes up error connecting retrying in 5 4 3 2 1, does anyone know whats causing this? If anyone helps me get this working im offering a .co.uk domain for free

this is the signlink to connect to the cache

public static final String findcachedir()
{
        try
        {
        	String s = "";
            String s1 = "./cache";
            File file = new File(s1 + s);
            if(file.exists() || file.mkdir())
                return s1 + s + "/";
        }
        catch(Exception _ex) { }

    return null;
}

is anything wrong with that ?

Thanks,
Elux

Read full topic
